thread.title: HydroWorld Premium Content offers daily business opportunities for hydro sector professionals
thread.title_full: HydroWorld Premium Content offers daily business opportunities for hydro sector professionals

title: HydroWorld Premium Content offers daily business opportunities for hydro sector professionals
text:
HydroWorld Premium Content offers daily business opportunities for hydro sector professionals TULSA, Okla. 09/03/2015 
PennWell's Hydro Group is proud to offer daily business opportunities for hydroelectric power industry manufacturers, suppliers, owners and operators through HydroWorld Premium Content. 
Premium Content is a subscription-based service that gives members exclusive access to tenders from around the world, Federal Energy Regulatory Commission news and analysis, and access to HydroWorld's downloadable FERC database. 
Every Premium Content subscription also includes: Additionally, all Premium Content subscribers also receive access to the ENvision Express database, which provides: The location of and basic details about more than 9,000 power plants including 2,200 hydro facilities Owner, operator, capacity and fuel information More than 750,000 miles of power transmission lines and 54,000 substations Dynamic Search and Filtering functions Print and export options Service territories and regulatory regions Multiple basemaps Routing to/from assets Learn more about HydroWorld Premium Content by taking a virtual tour , or request a free demonstration by clicking here . Related Articles InvestBank Corp. has acquired a 70% equity stake in the 440-MW Tila-1 and 420-MW Tila-2 hydr... Recent Comments 
- 1,300 companies from throughout the world - 6,000 hydro products and services - Search for a specific company, product or service There is no current content available.
